tooltip.market: A release needs to be selected first to see possible market options. Only user assigned options are shown.
tooltip.adapter: An environment needs to be selected first to see possible target systems.
tooltip.language: A market and a release needs to be selected first to see possible language options. Only user assigned options are shown.
